verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:16
verses.text: The pots also, and the shovels, and the fleshhooks, and all their instruments, did Huram his father make to king Solomon for the house of the Lord of bright brass.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:17
verses.text: In the plain of Jordan did the king cast them, in the clay ground between Succoth and Zeredathah.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:18
verses.text: Thus Solomon made all these vessels in great abundance: for the weight of the brass could not be found out.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:19
verses.text: And Solomon made all the vessels that were for the house of God, the golden altar also, and the tables whereon the shewbread was set;
